fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Investigate a player each night, learn their subalignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your target doesn't have Killing/Investigative/Protective/Support/Social as their subalignment, you learn which one the host thinks their role fits more in.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
